description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Mark Robinson withdraws from or officially announces his withdrawal from the 2024 North Carolina gubernatorial race, or announces the suspension of his 2024 NC gubernatorial campaign, by 11:59 PM ET on September 30, 2024.

In the event of any extenuating circumstances that prevent Mark Robinson from continuing the race, this market will also resolve to "Yes".

If Mark Robinson does not announce his withdrawal or campaign's suspension, or is not forced to withdraw from the 2024 NC gubernatorial race by the specified time, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Mark Robinson or his official/legal representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Will Mark Robinson drop out in September?

question: Will Mark Robinson drop out in September?
